entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:43 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cobourg

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 3:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with drizzle changing to snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 8.
